trait.name: Fear Eater
entries: The blackguard scores a critical hit on a roll of 17-20 on attacks made against a creature that is frightened.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The blackguard has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackguard makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a Blackguard's Challenge, if available.

action.name: Treacherous Blade
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 3 (1d6) damage to a creature flanked by the blackguard.

action.name: Raise the False Lord's Banner
entries: The blackguard hoists its banner high. Until the beginning of its next turn, each of the blackguard's allies that can see it have advantage on attack rolls and Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Blackguard's Challenge (Recharge 5-6)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be forced to meet the blackguard in melee combat. On its following turn, the creature must use its full movement to move directly toward the blackguard.

reaction.name: Counterattack
entries: The blackguard adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. If this causes the attack to miss, the blackguard may make a melee attack as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Outrider
entries: While riding a metal beast or similar creature, the brethren acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own, and it has advantage on attack rolls against creatures smaller than its mount.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brethren makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Steel Whip
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is mounted, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Hidden Blade
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage. This attack has advantage against targets with a Passive Perception of 12 or lower.

reaction.name: Righteous Retaliation
entries: When a creature within the brethren's reach hits one of its allies with an attack, the brethren can make a melee attack against the creature.

trait.name: Stampede of Steel
entries: When the metal beast moves, each adjacent metal beast may use its reaction to move with it. If one or more metal beasts do so, the metal beast has advantage on attack rolls this turn.

trait.name: Reckless Follow-Through
entries: At the start of its turn, the metal beast can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it falls prone and is stunned until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. The metal beast can make this attack as a Bonus Action against a prone target.

action.name: Burning Trail
entries: The metal beast moves up to 50 feet in a straight line, leaving a trail of flame behind it. Each creature in its path must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone, or move to the nearest unoccupied space on a success. Until the beginning of the metal beast's next turn, a creature that starts its turn in the affected area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 11 (2d10) fire damage.

action.name: Thrashing Horns (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Two creatures on opposite sides of the metal beast must each succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d12) piercing damage and be pushed 10 feet away, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: As a reaction to a creature moving within 5 ft. of it, the metal beast forces the creature to succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or take 13 (3d8) piercing damage and be knocked prone.

trait.name: Mammoth Rider
entries: While riding a mammoth or similar beast, the warrior acts on its mount's initiative, rather than rolling its own, and it cannot be frightened by any creature smaller than its mount.

trait.name: Eyes Filled With Hate
entries: The warrior does not die or fall unconscious due to having 0 hit points if it attacked or was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the warrior fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Spur Mammoth.

action.name: Spear of Destiny
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

action.name: Crushing Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the warrior's next turn.

action.name: Spur Mammoth
entries: If the mammoth warrior is mounted, its mount can use its reaction to move up to half its speed or make a melee attack.

action.name: Starmetal Wind Strike (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The warrior sends a torrent of bladed wind forth from its spear in a 100 foot long, 10 foot wide line. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 28 (8d6) piercing damage and be pushed 15 feet away, or take half as much damage on a success.

legendary.name: Ancestral Might
entries: The warrior gains 11 (2d10) temporary hit points.

legendary.name: Crushing Stomp
entries: The warrior makes a crushing stomp attack.

trait.name: Coal-Eyed Gaze
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the noble and can see it subtracts 1d4 from Wisdom saving throws it makes until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Silver Tongue
entries: The noble has advantage on Charisma based ability checks to interact with guards or other figures of authority.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble makes two attacks with its rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding.

action.name: Treacherous Command
entries: Up to two of the noble's allies within 30 feet that can hear it may each use their reaction to make a melee attack against the same target.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Bon Mot
entries: When the noble is missed with a melee attack, it can make a cutting remark. The attacker must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls that target the noble until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the bat remains motionless and pressed flat against a tree, the bat is indistinguishable from tree bark by creatures more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Echolocation
entries: If the bat is not deafened, it gains one of the following benefits until the end of its next turn:

items.name: Low Frequency
entries: The bat gains Blindsight to a range of 60 feet.

items.name: High Frequency
entries: The bat has advantage on melee attack rolls. Whenever the bat uses its Chaotic Swerve and the triggering attack misses it, the bat regains its reaction.

reaction.name: Chaotic Swerve
entries: As a reaction when the bat is targeted with an attack, it may move 5 feet directly toward the nearest creature and impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
Then, if one or more creatures are within 5 feet of it, the bat must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

name: Brasswood Treant
resist: bludgeoning and piercing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Sun-Soaked
entries: In bright sunlight, the treant gleams as though made of precious metals, reflecting glaring light in a 10 ft. radius. A creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the treant may spend half of its movement to attempt a DC 16 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the treant. While climbing on the treant, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the treant, and the treant has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The treant makes two earthshaking slam attacks, one of which it may replace with a rock or a use of its Sundrip.

action.name: Earthshaking Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and the target is knocked prone. Non-treant creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage and being knocked prone on a failed save.

action.name: Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sundrip
entries: One creature within 20 ft. of the treant must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a drop of sunsap. Until a creature takes an action to remove it, the creature takes 9 (2d8) radiant damage at the beginning of each of its turns.

action.name: Grasping Roots (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the treant must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 19 (3d12) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
A prone creature makes this saving throw with disadvantage, and is additionally restrained (escape DC 16) on a failure.

reaction.name: Kindled Lifeblood
entries: When the treant takes any fire or radiant damage, it can use its Sundrip.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the nighthart moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bladed antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

trait.name: Springing Grace
entries: The nighthart's high jump is up to 10 ft., or up to 15 ft. with a running start. It may treat any surface at least 1 inch across as solid ground to jump off of.

trait.name: Wilting Aura
entries: Nonmagical plants within 30 feet of the nighthart wither and die.

action.name: Bladed Antlers
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
If the target is Medium or smaller, it is pushed 5 ft. away, or is restrained (escape DC 13). If the target cannot be pushed, it it insead restrained until the deer moves at least 5 feet.

action.name: Rearing Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Unearthly Scream (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The nighthart releases a haunting sound. Each creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action until the end of its following turn.

reaction.name: Elusive Sidle
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 ft. of the nighthart, the nighthart moves up to half its speed in any direction other than directly away from the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: When a creature ends its movement within 5 feet of it, the nighthart can force the creature to succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or take 4 (1d8) piercing damage and be knocked prone.

trait.name: Annihilating Aura
entries: A living creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the nightkeeper must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Instinctive Echo
entries: The nightkeeper reflexively echoes any sounds it hears, particularly sounds distinct from the ordinary noise of their environment.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim Light or darkness, the nightkeeper can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The nigthkeeper can burrow through solid rock or wood at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nightkeeper makes two attacks, one of which may be with its Dismembering Bite.

action.name: Dismembering Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 23 (3d12 + 4) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 13 (2d12) damage to a prone creature. If this attack deals damage greater than half the target's hit points, the target must succeed a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or lose a limb and drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Scythe Limbs
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is wearing leather or cloth armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Thrashing Fury (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The nightkeeper makes six attacks with its scything limbs. A creature hit with three or more of these attacks must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

reaction.name: Rattling Hiss
entries: When the nightkeeper takes any fire damage, it can move up to half its speed and emanate a menacing hiss.
Each creature within 30 feet that can hear it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the nightkeeper's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The quillbadger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The quillbadger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 hit points if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the quillbadger starts its turn with 0 hit points without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 4 (1d8) damage to a prone creature.
After making this attack, the quillbadger may Dash or Disengage as a bonus action.

action.name: Quill Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The quillbadger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The quillbadger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 hit points if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the quillbadger starts its turn with 0 hit points without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The quillbadger can burrow through solid rock or wood at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quillbadger makes two attacks, one of which may be with its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 9 (2d8) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Quill Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Fire Quills (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The quillbadger ejects quills in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Run Down
entries: When a hostile creature the quillbadger can see ends its movement at least 20 feet further from the quillbear than it started, the quillbadger can move up to its speed towards the creature.
If the quillbadger ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Hyperborean Mammoth
resist: damage from attacks made without advantage

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the mammoth may spend its full movement to attempt a DC 17 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the mammoth's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the mammoth's legs to its back, or from its back to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's legs, a creature has advantage on attacks against it.

items.name: Back
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's back, the mammoth has immunity to damage the creature deals and cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the mammoth's back that falls prone does not fall off.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's head, the creature has advantage on melee attacks against the mammoth and the mammoth cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the mammoth's head that falls prone does not fall off.

trait.name: Spear Maddened
entries: Weapon attacks against the mammoth with the Reach property are made at advantage. Whenever the mammoth takes damage from a spear, glaive, pike, or similar long, bladed weapon, it must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the mammoth attacks the nearest creature it can see on its following turn.

trait.name: Swath of Carnage
entries: The mammoth may move through the space of any Large or smaller creature without penalty. When the mammoth enters a creature's space for the first time on a turn, the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the mammoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mammoth makes two attacks; one with its tusks and one with its stomp.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 11 (2d10) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tusk Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage, be pushed 15 ft. away and knocked prone, or take half as much damage and be knocked prone on a success.
A creature that succeeds by 5 or more takes no damage, is not knocked prone, and can climb onto the malukant's head as a reaction.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: When the mammoth is reduced below 78 hit points, it can thrash wildly. Each creature riding or climbing on it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or fall prone in the nearest unoccupied space and take 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire quillbadger takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The quillbadger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The quillbadger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 hit points if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the quillbadger starts its turn with 0 hit points without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 21 (3d12 + 3) damage to a prone creature.
After making this attack, the quillbadger may Dash or Disengage as a bonus action.

action.name: Quill Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d8 + 3) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire quillbadger matriarch takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The quillbadger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The quillbadger does not die or fall unconscious due to dropping to 0 hit points if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the quillbadger starts its turn with 0 hit points without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The quillbadger can burrow through solid rock or wood at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quillbadger makes two attacks, one of which may be with its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 29 (4d12 + 5) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Quill Rush
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Fire Quills (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The quillbadger ejects quills in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 (8d10 + 5) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Run Down
entries: When a hostile creature the quillbadger can see ends its movement at least 20 feet further from the quillbear than it started, the quillbadger can move up to its speed towards the creature.
If the quillbadger ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Dire Hyperborean Mammoth
resist: damage from attacks made without advantage

trait.name: Dire Rage
entries: When the dire hyperborean mammoth takes the Attack action, it can make an additional attack with a natural weapon.

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the mammoth may spend its full movement to attempt a DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the mammoth's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the mammoth's legs to its back, or from its back to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's legs, a creature has advantage on attacks against it.

items.name: Back
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's back, the mammoth has immunity to damage the creature deals and cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the mammoth's back that falls prone does not fall off.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the mammoth's head, the creature has advantage on melee attacks against the mammoth and the mammoth cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the mammoth's head that falls prone does not fall off.

trait.name: Spear Maddened
entries: Weapon attacks against the mammoth with the Reach property are made at advantage. Whenever the mammoth takes damage from a spear, glaive, pike, or similar long, bladed weapon, it must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the mammoth attacks the nearest creature it can see on its following turn.

trait.name: Swath of Carnage
entries: The mammoth may move through the space of any Large or smaller creature without penalty. When the mammoth enters a creature's space for the first time on a turn, the creature must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the mammoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mammoth makes two attacks; one with its tusks and one with its stomp.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (5d10 + 8) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 36 (4d14 + 8) damage to a prone creature.

action.name: Tusk Sweep (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 33 (5d10 + 8) slashing damage, be pushed 15 ft. away and knocked prone, or take half as much damage and be knocked prone on a success.
A creature that succeeds by 5 or more takes no damage, is not knocked prone, and can climb onto the malukant's head as a reaction.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: When the mammoth is reduced below 78 hit points, it can thrash wildly. Each creature riding or climbing on it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or fall prone in the nearest unoccupied space and take 38 (6d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
